sentences.simplifiedText: 为了地球的未来，我们应当节省能源，保护环境。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了地球的未來，我們應當節省能源，保護環境。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile dìqiú de wèilái, wǒmen yīngdāng jiéshěng néngyuán, bǎohù huánjìng.
sentences.translation: For the future of the Earth, we should save energy and protect the environment.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi jié shěng yòng shuǐ.

sentences.simplifiedText: 面对严重的水资源短缺，我们必须更加注重节省用水。
sentences.traditionalText: 面對嚴重的水資源短缺，我們必須更加注重節省用水。
sentences.pinyin: miàn duì yán zhòng de shuǐ zī yuán duǎn quē, wǒ men bì xū gèng jiā zhù zhòng jié shěng yòng shuǐ.
sentences.translation: Facing severe water shortage, we must pay more attention to using water sparingly.
